dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1461 IS: To provide for the extension of the enforcement instruction on supervision requirements for outpatient therapeutic services in critical access and small rural hospitals through 2015.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Thune (for himself, Ms. Cantwell, Mr. Moran, and Mr. Tester) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To provide for the extension of the enforcement instruction on supervision requirements for outpatient therapeutic services in critical access and small rural hospitals through 2015.

section.header: Extension of enforcement instruction on supervision requirements for outpatient therapeutic services in critical access and small rural hospitals through 2015
section.text: Section 1 of Public Law 113–198 is amended—

paragraph.text: in the section heading, by striking 2014 and inserting 2015; and
by striking calendar year 2014 and inserting calendar year 2015.
